entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
